data.name: Avenging Knight Parshath
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner LIGHT monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

card_sets.set_name: The Duelist Genesis Sneak Peek Participation Card

data.name: Battle Tuned
data.desc: Remove from play 1 Tuner monster from your Graveyard. Target face-up monster you control gains ATK equal to the removed monster's ATK.

data.name: Beast of the Pharaoh
data.desc: If this card is sent to the GY for a Synchro Summon: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

data.name: Big Piece Golem
data.desc: If your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributes.

data.name: Book of Eclipse
data.desc: Change all face-up monsters on the field to face-down Defense Position. During the End Phase of this turn, change as many face-down Defense Position monsters your opponent controls as possible to face-up Defense Position, then your opponent draws cards equal to the number of monsters changed face-up by this effect.

data.name: Broken Blocker
data.desc: Activate only when a Defense Position monster you control, whose DEF is higher than its ATK, is destroyed by battle. Special Summon up to 2 monsters with the same name as that monster from your Deck in face-up Defense Position.

data.name: Charge of the Light Brigade
data.desc: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard; add 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster from your Deck to your hand.

card_sets.set_name: Premium Gold: Return of the Bling
Rise of the True Dragons Structure Deck

data.name: Cold Enchanter
data.desc: You can discard 1 card to target 1 face-up monster on the field; place an Ice Counter on that target. This card gains 300 ATK for each Ice Counter on the field.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Counselor Lily
data.desc: When this card is sent to the Graveyard for a Synchro Summon, you can pay 500 Life Points to have that Synchro Monster gain 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

data.name: Cyber Shark
data.desc: If you control a WATER monster, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing.

data.name: Dark Hunter
data.desc: This card's effect changes depending on the number of DARK monsters in your Graveyard. ● 1 or fewer: This card loses 400 ATK. ● 2 to 4: This card gains 400 ATK. ● 5 or more: You can send this card to the Graveyard to destroy all face-down monsters your opponent controls.

data.name: Dark Resonator
data.desc: The first time this card would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: De-Synchro
data.desc: Target 1 Synchro Monster on the field; return that target to the Extra Deck, then, if all of the monsters that were used for the Synchro Summon of that monster are in your GY, you can Special Summon all of them.

data.name: Defense Draw
data.desc: During your opponent's turn, at damage calculation: Make the battle damage you take from this battle 0, and if you do, draw 1 card.

data.name: Destructotron
data.desc: During the End Phase, if this card is the only Psychic-Type monster you control: Destroy it. You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Set Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

data.name: Dharc the Dark Charmer
data.desc: FLIP: Take control of 1 DARK monster your opponent controls, while this card remains face-up on the field.

data.name: Doctor Cranium
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 800 Life Points to add 1 Psychic-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

data.name: Domino Effect
data.desc: When a monster your opponent controls is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can send 1 monster you control to the Graveyard to destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

data.name: Emergency Teleport
data.desc: Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Psychic-Type monster from your hand or Deck, but banish it during the End Phase of this turn.

data.name: Equip Shot
data.desc: Activate only during the Battle Phase. Select 1 Equip Card equipped to a face-up Attack Position monster you control, and select 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls. Equip that monster with the selected Equip Card. Then, conduct battle between your previously equipped monster and the selected monster (other effects cannot be activated during this battle).

data.name: Fiendish Engine Omega
data.desc: During your End Phase: Special Summon 1 "Engine Token" (Machine-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 200/DEF 200) in Attack Position. Once per turn: You can have this card gain 1000 ATK until the End Phase. During the End Phase, if this effect of this card was used: Destroy this card.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Fighting Spirit
data.desc: The equipped monster gains 300 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. If it would be destroyed by battle, you can destroy this card instead.

data.name: Fish Depth Charge
data.desc: Tribute 1 Fish-Type monster to target 1 card on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, draw 1 card.

data.name: Geartown
data.desc: Both players can Normal Summon "Ancient Gear" monsters for 1 less Tribute. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Ancient Gear" monster from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

data.name: Ghost Gardna
data.desc: When a face-up monster you control is selected as an attack target, you can change the target to this card. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, 1 face-up monster your opponent controls loses 1000 ATK, until the End Phase.

data.name: Gladiator Beast Equeste
data.desc: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster: Target 1 "Gladiator Beast" card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: You can shuffle it into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Equeste".

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Gladiator Beast War Chariot
data.desc: When an Effect Monster's effect is activated, if you control a face-up "Gladiator Beast" monster: Negate the activation and destroy it.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Gonogo
data.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled an opponent's monster: Change that monster to face-down Defense Position.

data.name: Goyo Guardian
data.desc:
1 EARTH Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon that monster to your field in Defense Position.

card_sets.set_name: Premium Gold: Return of the Bling

data.name: Graceful Revival
data.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Level 2 or lower monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

data.name: Grapple Blocker
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can select 1 monster your opponent controls. The selected monster cannot attack or be Tributed, while this card remains face-up on the field. During each of your End Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card.

data.name: Hand of the Six Samurai
data.desc: If you control another "Six Samurai" monster: You can Tribute 1 "Six Samurai" monster, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

data.name: Handcuffs Dragon
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle with an attacking monster your opponent controls and is sent to the Graveyard, you can equip this card to that monster. The equipped monster loses 1800 ATK. When it is destroyed and this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card.

data.name: Herald of Orange Light
data.desc: When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can send this card and 1 other Fairy monster from your hand to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

data.name: Ice Master
data.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 2 WATER monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; place an Ice Counter on that target. You can Tribute this card; destroy all monsters with an Ice Counter(s).

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Intercept
data.desc: Activate only when a monster is Tribute Summoned with 1 Tribute. Take control of that monster.

data.name: Izanagi
data.desc: You can Special Summon this card from your hand by removing from play 1 Spirit monster from your hand. Spirit monsters you control do not have to have their effects that return them to the hand activated.

data.name: Izanami
data.desc: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to its owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn it is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, you can discard 1 card to add 1 Spirit monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Jenis, Lightsworn Mender
data.desc: During the End Phase, if a card(s) was sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Lightsworn" card this turn: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, and if you do, gain 500 LP.

data.name: Judgment of Thunder
data.desc: Activate only when you Summon a Thunder-Type monster(s). Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

data.name: Junk Barrage
data.desc: When the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the destroyed monster's ATK in the Graveyard.

data.name: Jutte Fighter
data.desc: Once per turn, you can change 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls to face-up Defense Position.

data.name: Kinka-byo
data.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can target 1 Level 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target, but banish it when this card leaves the field. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand.

data.name: Krebons
data.desc: When this card is targeted for an attack: You can pay 800 LP; negate the attack.

data.name: Kunai with Chain
data.desc:
Activate 1 or both of these effects (simultaneously).
● When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; change that target to Defense Position.
● Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK.

data.name: Kunoichi
data.desc: When control of this face-up card changes, its new controller discards 1 random card.

data.name: Lightsworn Barrier
data.desc: When a "Lightsworn" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard, then target the attacking monster; negate the attack.

data.name: Lightsworn Sabre
data.desc: Equip only to a "Lightsworn" monster. It gains 700 ATK. When this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "Lightsworn" monster you control; equip this card to that target.

data.name: Lightwave Tuning
data.desc: Select 1 Level 4 LIGHT monster you control. It is treated as a Tuner monster while it is face-up on the field.

data.name: Magical Android
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
During each of your End Phases: Gain 600 LP for each Psychic-Type monster you currently control.

data.name: Maiden of Macabre
data.desc: Each time this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, place 1 Spell Counter on it. This card gains 200 ATK for each Spell Counter on it.

data.name: Mecha Bunny
data.desc: When this card is flipped face-up, select 1 card on the field and inflict 500 damage to its controller. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Mecha Bunny" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

data.name: Medium Piece Golem
data.desc: When this card is Summoned, if you control a "Big Piece Golem", you can Special Summon 1 "Small Piece Golem" from your Deck. That monster's effect is negated while it is face-up on the field.

data.name: Mind Master
data.desc: You can pay 800 Life Points and Tribute 1 Psychic-Type monster, except "Mind Master", to Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Psychic-Type monster from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

data.name: Mind Over Matter
data.desc: When a monster would be Normal or Special Summoned, OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Tribute 1 Psychic-Type monster; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

data.name: Mind Protector
data.desc: This card's controller must pay 500 Life Points during each of their Standby Phases. If they cannot, destroy this card. Monsters with 2000 or less ATK cannot declare an attack, except for Psychic-Type monsters.

data.name: Mirror of Yata
data.desc: Equip only to a Spirit monster. The equipped monster does not have to have its effect that returns it to the hand activated. If it would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead.

data.name: Montage Dragon
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 other monsters from your hand to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card's ATK becomes the combined original Levels of the sent monsters x 300.

data.name: Multiple Piece Golem
data.desc:
"Big Piece Golem" + "Medium Piece Golem"
At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Extra Deck. Then, if all of the Fusion Material Monsters that were used for the Fusion Summon of this card are in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon them.

data.name: Needlebug Nest
data.desc: Send the top 5 cards of your Deck to the GY.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the True Dragons Structure Deck

data.name: Nitro Synchron
data.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a "Nitro" Synchro Monster: Draw 1 card.

data.name: Nitro Warrior
data.desc:
"Nitro Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once during each of your turns, if you activate a Spell Card, this card gains 1000 ATK during the next attack this turn involving this card, during damage calculation only. If this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: You can target 1 face-up Defense Position monster your opponent controls; change that target to Attack Position, then this card can make a second attack in a row, on that monster.

data.name: Noisy Gnat
data.desc: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to target 1 face-up monster on the field; increase that target's Level by 1, until the End Phase.

data.name: Orb of Yasaka
data.desc: Equip only to a Spirit monster. When it destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, gain Life Points equal to that monster's original ATK. When the equipped monster you control is returned to the hand and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

data.name: Overworked
data.desc: Destroy each monster whose ATK is higher than its original ATK.

Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Oyster Meister
data.desc: If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, except when destroyed by battle: Special Summon 1 "Oyster Token" (Fish-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).

data.name: Power Filter
data.desc: Neither player can Special Summon monsters with 1000 or less ATK.

data.name: Psi-Impulse
data.desc: Tribute 1 Psychic-Type monster. Return all cards in your opponent's hand to the Deck. Then, they draw 3 cards.

data.name: Psi-Station
data.desc: When a Psychic-Type monster is Normal Summoned: You can pay 500 LP; increase its Level by 1 and ATK by 300. (This remains even if this card leaves the field.)

data.name: Psychic Commander
data.desc: When a Psychic-Type monster you control battles, during the Damage Step you can pay Life Points in multiples of 100 (max. 500) to have the monster it's battling lose that much ATK and DEF, until the End Phase.

data.name: Psychic Overload
data.desc: Target 3 Psychic-Type monsters in your Graveyard; shuffle all 3 into the Deck, then draw 2 cards.

data.name: Psychic Rejuvenation
data.desc: Gain 1000 Life Points for each face-up Psychic-Type monster you control.

data.name: Psychic Snail
data.desc: You can pay 800 Life Points and select 1 other face-up Psychic-Type monster you control. That monster can attack twice during each Battle Phase. This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

data.name: Quillbolt Hedgehog
data.desc: If this card is in your Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You must control a Tuner monster to activate and to resolve this effect.

data.name: Recycling Batteries
data.desc: Target 2 Thunder-Type monsters with 1500 or less ATK in your Graveyard; add those targets to your hand.

data.name: Red Dragon Archfiend
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
After damage calculation, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster your opponent controls: Destroy all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls. During your End Phase: Destroy all other monsters you control that did not declare an attack this turn. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

data.name: Remote Revenge
data.desc: Activate only when a monster you control is targeted by a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster's effect that destroys 1 monster on the field. Switch the target to an appropriate monster your opponent controls.

data.name: Shield Warrior
data.desc: During damage calculation, in either player's turn: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; monsters you control cannot be destroyed by this battle.

Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Silent Strider
data.desc: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to reduce the Level of 1 monster on the field by 1, until the End Phase.

data.name: Sinister Sprocket
data.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a DARK Synchro Monster, you can destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap Card.

data.name: Small Piece Golem
data.desc: When this card is Summoned, if you control a "Big Piece Golem", you can Special Summon 1 "Medium Piece Golem" from your Deck. That monster's effect is negated while it is face-up on the field.

data.name: Spacegate
data.desc: Each time a monster your opponent controls attacks or is attacked, place 1 Gate Counter on this card at the end of the Damage Step. During your Main Phase: You can send this card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand whose Level is less than or equal to the number of Gate Counters on this card.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Splendid Venus
data.desc: All non-Fairy monsters lose 500 ATK/DEF. The activation and effects of Spell/Trap Cards activated on your field cannot be negated.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Stardust Dragon
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. During the End Phase, if this effect was activated this turn (and was not negated): You can Special Summon this card from your GY.

data.name: Sword of Kusanagi
data.desc: Equip only to a Spirit monster. During battle, when it attacks a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the equipped monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. When the equipped monster you control is returned to the hand and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

data.name: Synchro Deflector
data.desc: Activate only when a face-up Synchro Monster you control is selected as an attack target. Negate the attack and destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

data.name: Telekinetic Charging Cell
data.desc: Equip only to a Psychic-Type monster. You do not have to pay Life Points to activate its effect(s). When the equipped monster is destroyed and this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 1000 Life Points to return this card to your hand.

data.name: Telekinetic Shocker
data.desc: If a Psychic-Type monster(s) on the field would be destroyed, you can pay 500 LP and destroy this card instead.

data.name: Telepathic Power
data.desc: When a Psychic-Type monster you control is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster: Target the opponent's monster; destroy that target, and if you do, gain LP equal to the destroyed monster's ATK on the field.

data.name: The Selection
data.desc: Pay 1000 Life Points. Negate the Summon of a monster that has the same Type as a monster on the field, and destroy it.

data.name: The Tricky
data.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Thought Ruler Archfiend
data.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK in the Graveyard. During either player's turn, when a Spell/Trap Card is activated that targets exactly 1 Psychic-Type monster (and no other cards): You can pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

data.name: Toy Magician
data.desc: You can Set this card from your hand to your Spell & Trap Zone as a Spell. During the End Phase, if this Set card in your Spell & Trap Zone was destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent to the GY this turn: Special Summon this card. If this card is Flip Summoned: Destroy Spells and Traps on the field, equal to the number of "Toy Magicians" on the field.

data.name: Trap of Darkness
data.desc: If your LP is 3000 or less: Pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Normal Trap in your GY, except "Trap of Darkness"; this card's effect becomes that target's activated effect, then banish that target.

data.name: Tricky Spell 4
data.desc: Send 1 face-up "The Tricky" you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon "Tricky Tokens" (Spellcaster-Type/WIND/Level 5/ATK 2000/DEF 1200) in Defense Position, equal to the number of monsters your opponent controls. "Tricky Tokens" cannot declare an attack.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Turbo Booster
data.desc: If you have Normal Summoned a monster this turn, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can Tribute this card to destroy 1 monster your opponent controls that battled one of your monsters this turn.

data.name: Twin-Barrel Dragon
data.desc: When this card is Summoned: Target 1 card your opponent controls; toss a coin twice, and if the result is 2 Heads, destroy it.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Twin-Shield Defender
data.desc: When this card you control is destroyed by battle and sent to your Graveyard, you can halve the current ATK of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, until the End Phase.

data.name: Unstable Evolution
data.desc: While your LP is lower than your opponent's, the equipped monster's original ATK becomes 2400. While your LP is higher, the equipped monster's original ATK becomes 1000.

data.name: Yamato-no-Kami
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 1 Spirit monster from your Graveyard. This card returns to its owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn it is Special Summoned. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you can destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.
